member.name: F:Infragistics.Windows.OutlookBar.SplitterResizeMode.Immediate
member.summary: The is resized in real time as the splitter is dragged.

member.name: T:Infragistics.Windows.OutlookBar.OutlookBarGroup
member.summary: Represents a headered content area in a (commonly referred to as a 'group') that displays image and text in the header and developer-supplied content in the content area.
member.remarks: OutlookBarGroups can appear in any of 3 locations in the control: the navigation area, the overflow area and the overflow context menu. When displayed in one of these areas, only the OutlookBarGroup's headser () is shown. When an OutlookBarGroup is selected, its header (with image and/or text) and content also appear in the selected group area.

member.name: T:Infragistics.Windows.OutlookBar.XamOutlookBar
member.summary: The XamOutlookBar is a WPF Component that provides the UI and functionality of the navigation bar/strip in the applications /Like MS Outlook 2003 or later versions/
member.remarks: XamOutlookBar is a WPF version of the existing Infragistics WinExplorerBar element. The WPF version of the supports only the OutlookNavigationPane style. It is not backward-compatible with the WinExplorerBar control.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Windows.OutlookBar.XamOutlookBar.AllowMinimized
member.summary: Returns/sets the possibility of the to be minimized. This is a dependency property.

remarks.p: By default, AllowMinimized is true. Set this property to false to prevent minimizing of .

member.name: P:Infragistics.Windows.OutlookBar.XamOutlookBar.ContextMenuGroups
member.summary: Returns a read only collection of items in the overflow context menu of XamOutlookBar

remarks.p: The groups in the ContextMenuGroups collection will be displayed inside overflow context menu of XamOutlookBar. The of each group in this collection is set to OutlookBarGroupLocation.OverflowContextMenu.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Windows.OutlookBar.XamOutlookBar.ExpandStoryboard
member.summary: Returns/set the that plays when it goes to the expanded state. This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Windows.OutlookBar.XamOutlookBar.Groups
member.summary: Returns a modifiable collection of items.

remarks.p: The developer can use only one of or properties to add groups to the control. Each in the Groups belongs to one of readonly collectons:

member.name: P:Infragistics.Windows.OutlookBar.XamOutlookBar.GroupsSource
member.summary: Gets or sets a collection used to generate the content of the . This is a dependency property.

remarks.p: The developer can use only one of or properties to add groups to the control. This allows the Groups collection to be populated via a binding on the GroupsSource property. When GroupsSource is in use, setting this property to null will remove the collection and restore use to Groups (which will be an empty collection).

member.name: P:Infragistics.Windows.OutlookBar.XamOutlookBar.IsMinimized
member.summary: Returns/sets whether the is in minimized state. This is a dependency property.

remarks.p: By default is false. The minimized state of XamOutlookBar depends also on AllowMinimized and MinimizedStateThreshold properties.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Windows.OutlookBar.XamOutlookBar.IsVerticalSplitterVisible
member.summary: Returns/sets a value indicating whether the vertical splitter is visible in the user interface. This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Windows.OutlookBar.XamOutlookBar.MinimizedStateThreshold
member.summary: Returns/sets the number of pixels over the minimized size where the controls snaps to its minimized state. This is a dependency property.

remarks.para: When the property value has not been set the resolves the threshold to a calculated value that is the width in minimized state.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Windows.OutlookBar.XamOutlookBar.MinimizedWidth
member.summary: Returns/set the width of in minimized state. This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Windows.OutlookBar.XamOutlookBar.MinimizeStoryboard
member.summary: Returns/set the that XamOutlookBar plays when it goes to the minimized state.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Windows.OutlookBar.XamOutlookBar.NavigationAreaGroups
member.summary: Returns a readonly collection of items in the navigation area of the XamOutlookBar

remarks.p: The groups in the NavigationAreaGroups collection are displayed inside navigation area of . The of each group in this collection is set to .NavigationGroupArea.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Windows.OutlookBar.XamOutlookBar.NavigationAreaMaxGroups
member.summary: Returns/set desired number of groups in the navigation area of the . This is a dependency property.

remarks.p: By default, NavigationAreaMaxGroups is -1 which meaning that XamOutlookBar will put as much as possible groups in the navigation area depending on available space.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Windows.OutlookBar.XamOutlookBar.NavigationPaneOptionsControlStyle
member.summary: Returns/set the style of . This is a dependency property.
member.p: The NavigationPaneOptionsControl is used to change the display order and visibility of the groups

member.name: P:Infragistics.Windows.OutlookBar.XamOutlookBar.OverflowAreaGroups
member.summary: Returns a readonly collection of items in the XamOutlookBar overflow area

remarks.p: The groups in the OverflowAreaGroups collection are displayed inside overflow area of XamOutlookBar. The of each group in this collection is set to OutlookBarGroupLocation.OverflowArea.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Windows.OutlookBar.XamOutlookBar.ReserveSpaceForLargeImage
member.summary: Returns/sets whether the space exists for the LargeImage of an . This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Windows.OutlookBar.XamOutlookBar.SelectedAreaMinHeight
member.summary: Returns/sets the the minimum height of the selected group area, in device-independent units. This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Windows.OutlookBar.XamOutlookBar.SelectedGroup
member.summary: Returns/sets the currently selected group in the . This is a dependency property.

remarks.p: The content of SelectedGroup is displayed in the selected group content area of XamOutlookBar. The amount of space allocated is determined by the SelectedAreaMinHeight property.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Windows.OutlookBar.XamOutlookBar.SelectedGroupContent
member.summary: Returns the Content of current . This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Windows.OutlookBar.XamOutlookBar.SelectedGroupContentTemplate
member.summary: Returns the of current . This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Windows.OutlookBar.XamOutlookBar.SelectedGroupContentTemplateSelector
member.summary: Returns which allows the app writer to provide custom style selection logic. This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Windows.OutlookBar.XamOutlookBar.ShowGroupHeaderAsToolTip
member.summary: Returns/sets the possibility to show OutlookBarGroup header in the overflow area as ToolTip. This is a dependency property.

remarks.p: The OutlookBarGroup fills the tooltip with Header only when it has no tooltip property set and ShowGroupHeaderAsToolTip is true.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Windows.OutlookBar.XamOutlookBar.ShowToolTips
member.summary: Returns/sets the possibility of the tooltip appearance for the group in the overflow area. This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Windows.OutlookBar.XamOutlookBar.Theme
member.summary: Gets/sets the default look for the control. This is a dependency property.

remarks.para: If left set to null then the default 'Generic' theme will be used. This property can be set to the name of any registered theme (see and methods).

member.name: P:Infragistics.Windows.OutlookBar.XamOutlookBar.VerticalSplitterLocation
member.summary: Returns/sets the location of vertical splitter of the XamOutlookBar. This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Windows.OutlookBar.XamOutlookBar.VerticalSplitterResizeMode

member.name: P:Infragistics.Windows.OutlookBar.XamOutlookBar.VerticalSplitterWidth
member.summary: Returns/sets the width of vertical splitter. This is a dependency property.

remarks.p: This property allows the developer to set the Width of the splitter without having to specify a Style (via the VerticalSplitterStyleKey property).
